content.body: jschoi: The forbidden extension re colon was added in ES6.
content.formatted_body: jschoi: The forbidden extension re colon was added in ES6.

content.body: (The whole Forbidden Extensions clause was added in ES6.)
FYI, I wrote drafts of “shallow copy”  and “deep copy” glossary entries for MDN. PR is at https://github.com/mdn/content/pull/12474. Review would be very much appreciated.

The rendered draft pages are here:
- https://pr12474.content.dev.mdn.mozit.cloud/en-US/docs/Glossary/Shallow_copy
- https://pr12474.content.dev.mdn.mozit.cloud/en-US/docs/Glossary/Deep_copy
